content: free video tutorial only knitting pattern for sizes 0-3 3-6 6-12 12-24 months https //seventhsedge etsy com/listing/4355853486 sizes 0-3 3-6 6-12 12-24 months the sizes correspond to a chest measurement of approximately 14 5-16 16-17 5 17 5-19 19-20 5 inches / 36-40 40-44 44-48 48-52 cm measurements chest circumference 20 5 22 5 25 27 inches / 52 57 5 63 68 5 cm length 11 12 5 13 5 14 5 inches / 28 31 34 37 cm sleeve length 10 5 12 13 5 15 inches / 27 31 35 39 cm gauge 16 stitches and 22 row = 4 × 4 inches / 10 × 10 cm in stockinette stitch needles u s 8 5 mm circular needles and u s 8 5 mm double-pointed needles if not using the magic loop technique or size needed to obtain gauge yarn worsted weight yarn approx 197 yds / 180 m per 85 g / 3 oz skein main color 70 90 110 130 g contrast color 40 60 80 100 g sample shown in lion brand wool-ease materials scissors stitch markers tapestry needle measuring tape techniques cast on knit purl m1r m1l k2tog p2tog bind off the striped baby pullover is a perfect sweater for both girls and boys this classic raglan is worked seamlessly from the top down in the round using circular needles with raglan increases the sleeves are worked in the round using either double-pointed needles or circular needles with the magic loop technique this pattern can be easily adjusted to your desired length the pullover is designed to be worn with 4-6 inches / 10-15 cm of positive ease at the chest
